response.original_title: Ancient School - The Search For Planet X
response.overview: Some large force seems to be affecting the motion of the planets and probes we send into space. We have been looking for a large unknown body to explain the affects we see on our solar system. See the latest evidence for a search for planet x, with new data about our solar system being binary, having 2 suns.
response.title: Ancient School - The Search For Planet X
